channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - August 19, 2022
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-august-19-2022) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _Alas for the Awful Sea_ * _Alien World_ * _Breathless_ * _Hearts of Wulin_ * _Nahual_ * _Scum and Villainy_ * _Stars in the Dark_ * _The Between_ * _The Veil_ * _Thrilling Adventures!_
All this, plus you can also catch the video of @edige23's talk _TTRPG Hacks and Getting Games to the Table_ (audio currently available in the Gauntlet podcast feed).
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Calendar category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-calendar) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Calendar](https://gauntletcalendar.com/events) to play!

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - August 19, 2022

@flatvurm wrote:

All this, plus you can also catch the video of @edige23’s talk TTRPG Hacks and Getting Games to the Table (audio currently available in the Gauntlet podcast feed).
